name: Tu dien Nhat Viet - Suge Dict
description: Hc gii ting Nht hn vi Suge Dict.  t mnh vo gc  ngi hc, ng dng cung cp nhiu tnh nng hu ch nh: - D liu phong ph vi hn 250.000 t Nht Vit, 55.000 t Vit Nht, 500 mu ng php, hn 4000 kanji thng dng vi gii thch chi tit. - Tc  tm kim cc nhanh. - H tr tm kim bng ging ni, qut nh t camera, v tay handwriting. - Tm kim kanji theo b (radical) -  tm kim nhanh cho php bn tra t k c khi ang c sch bo. T ng tm kim khi bn copy t ang c. - Th t, danh sch t, flashcard d dng, hc nhanh nh. - Hng dn cch c t ng. - Dch t ng online. Learn Japanese better with Suge Dict.  Put yourself into a learner perspective, the app offers many useful features such as: - Rich data with more than 250,000 Japanese Vietnamese words, 55,000 Vietnamese Japanese words, 500 grammatical patterns, more than 4000 common kanji with detailed explanations. - Extremely fast search speed. - Support for voice search, camera scan, handwriting. - Search for kanji by series (radical) - Quick search box allows you to look up words even when reading books and newspapers. Automatically search when you copy a word being read. - Word cards, word lists, easy-to-use flashcards and quick learning. - Instructions on how to read the word correctly. - Automatic translation online.
